installer.description: Installer for the AED-RTA Application, version 7

panel.title: ILS Automation Installer for AED-RTA
panel.preamble: Welcome to the ILS Automation installer for the Abnormal Event Detection and Real-Time Advisory(AED-RTA) application. The table below compares the existing installation of this product, if any, with the versions contained in this new installation. Before continuing, please make sure that you have defined tag providers and database connections.

panel.title: End User License Agreement (EULA)
panel.preamble: Click on the button below to view the license that specifies permissible use of the software to be installed. Select the checkbox to indicate acceptance of the terms. You must accept the license terms to proceed.

panel.title: Update Toolkit Properties
panel.preamble: Specify the tag provider and database connection to be used by AED-RTA. These values are used by subsequent screens.

panel.title: Custom Icons for AED-RTA
panel.preamble: Custom icons may be found in many of the user screens.

panel.title: Python Code for AED-RTA
panel.preamble: This page loads Python code specific to the XOM application. The Python is stored outside of the AED project in the Ignition installation directory. A second category consists of Java jar files that are referenced by this Python. Thirdly, property files for Internationalization are then stored in the Gateway installation directory: properties/aed/aed.property.

artifact.name: Jar Files to Support External Python

panel.title: Database Create and Alter Scripts for AED-RTA
panel.preamble: This page provides the opportunity for either creating a new database instance or altering an existing instance to accommodate schema corrections. WARNING: Do NOT apply these steps to existing AED-RTA installations. They will succeed only on new empty database instances.

panel.title: Help Table for AED-RTA Custom Functions
panel.preamble: Update the help descriptions for the AED-RTA custom functions.

panel.title: Install Custom Modules
panel.preamble: This step installs the model calculation module necessary for the AED-RTA applications.

panel.title: Install Tags and UDT Definitions
panel.preamble: This page defines UDTs and tags that are needed by the applications when running in PRODUCTION mode.

panel.title: Install a New AED Project or Merge Changes into an Existing Project
panel.preamble: AED is the main Ignition project. This page provides artifacts for a clean, new installation or, alternatively, a merge with an existing version. A merge preserves any user modifications from a previous version.

panel.title: Product Documentation
panel.preamble: The list below contains both user-level and design documents. They may be downloaded individually,as needed.

panel.title: Installation Summary
panel.preamble: The list below shows which of the installation steps have been completed. Selecting "Finish" will record the current version of EMC Ignition Applications in the Gateway internal database.

epilog.title: Ignition Applications - Installed
epilog.preamble: Now that all of the automated installation and configuration of the Exxon-Mobil Ignition Applications is complete, there are just a few more manual steps required.
epilog.note: Several modules with active components have been installed. A Gateway restart is required.
Newly created projects are disabled when they are installed. They must be enabled before use. Restart the Gateway first.
